DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample blood tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor identify learn biomarkers related cancer . It may also help doctor find good way treat cancer . PURPOSE : This research trial study gene expression sample patient T-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia .
DOC.brief_title: Gene Expression Samples From Patients With T-Cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To test whether tumor suppressor candidate gene PDLIM2 downregulated human cancer T-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia ( T-ALL ) use human T-lymphotropic virus 1 ( HTLV-1 ) -mediated vitro transformation human T cell control . OUTLINE : Previously collect cancer control tissue analyze expression pattern PDLIM2 control gene . Human T-cells isolate human blood also co-cultured HTLV-1-transformed T-cell line .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Specimens ( e.g. , tissue , blood , bodily fluid ) various cancer cell tissue deidentified patient Tcell acute lymphoblastic leukemia ( TALL ) Normal control tissue PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
